description: I. Implementation of directive 2006/43/EC on statutory audits of annual and consolidated accounts: consultation paper. Incl. regulatory impact assessment. 108 p. II.Implementation of directive 2006/46/EC on company reporting - amending the accounting directives: consultation paper. Incl. regulatory impact assessment. 70 p. III. Implementation of directive 2005/56/EC on cross-border mergers of limited liability companies: consultation paper. Incl. annex E & regulatory impact assessment. 78 p.
